AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Luis, Potosi, Mexico: starting point of the undocumented aliens' journey where Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero approached them
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where unlawful aliens were being transported and where the district court is located
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio: intended destination within the United States for the group guided by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Nuevo Laredo: location where aliens could have purchased provisions before crossing into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rio Grande River: border crossing point between Mexico and the United States, where the group took canoes to enter the US
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo South Station: location of border patrol agents who responded to the La Moca Ranch incident
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.La Moca Ranch: location where an undocumented female alien, Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez, was found dead due to probable heat stroke
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.South Texas: region where undocumented aliens were led through the desert-like brush, resulting in severe dehydration and heat stroke
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mexico: country of origin for illegal aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Diego: destination in the United States for illegal aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ninth Circuit: court of appeals that upheld the application of a factual scenario and provided instructional case law on intent requirements for enhancements
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Cuyler: location of a referenced court case, similar to the case of Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero, involving reckless endangerment in alien smuggling
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.House Conference Report: report that provides guidance on the imposition of sentencing enhancements for alien smuggling offenses involving conduct that recklessly endangers others, directing the Sentencing Commission to allow for enhancements when defendants engage in conduct placing another in serious danger of death or serious bodily injury
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo: location of the hospital where dehydrated aliens were transported and received medical attention
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.bed of a pickup truck: location where unrestrained aliens were transported, posing a substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury due to potential ejection during accidents or sharp driving maneuvers
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.highway: route where accidents or driving maneuvers can occur, posing a risk to unrestrained passengers, such as those being smuggled in the bed of a pickup truck
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.House: referring to the House Conference Report that directed the Sentencing Commission to allow for sentencing enhancements in cases of alien smuggling offenses involving reckless endangerment
